description.raw:
On Ogre < 1.13, the definition of OGRE\_PLUGIN\_DIR in the OGRE CMake configuration file on Windows is wrong.To avoid problems, on Windows we set OGRE\_PLUGINDIR manually.  
  
Note that this affects the  logic of handling OGRE on Windows and when it is not found with `pkg-config` , so it should be quite safe to merge it. Furthermore, beside the OGRE installed by `vcpkg` I also checked the OGRE installed by ROSOnWindows via Chocolatey \([https://roswin.azurewebsites.net/packages/ogre/](https://roswin.azurewebsites.net/packages/ogre/)\) and the binary available in the Windows docs \([https://s3.amazonaws.com/osrf-distributions/win32/deps/ogre-sdk-1.10.12-vc15-x64.zip](https://s3.amazonaws.com/osrf-distributions/win32/deps/ogre-sdk-1.10.12-vc15-x64.zip)\) and in both plugins are indeed installed in `${OGRE_PREFIX_DIR}/bin`, so we should safe even if those packages are used in an system without `pkg-config` .

See [https://github.com/OGRECave/ogre/issues/1499](https://github.com/OGRECave/ogre/issues/1499) for more info.
